metadata.title: CVE-2020-14394 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: infinite loop in xhci_ring_chain_length() in hw/usb/hcd-xhci.c

notes.note: mdeslaur> as of 2022-01-05, no fix from upstream for this issue. impact is limited, a privileged guest user can only use this issue to perform a denial of service to their own instance

criterions.comment: qemu package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-01-05').
